Package com.pdfjet

Class Chart

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.pdfjet.Chart
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Drawable
    public class Chart
extends java.lang.Object
implements Drawable
    Used to create XY chart objects and draw them on a page. Please see Example_09.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      Chart​(Font f1, Font f2)
      Create a XY chart object.

        public float[] drawOn​(Page page)
               throws java.lang.Exception
        Draws this chart on the specified page.
        Specified by:
        drawOn in interface Drawable
        Parameters:

        Returns:

        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - if the draw method did not succeed.
